product_name: Sea to Summit Nano Mosquito Pyramid Insect Shield Net Shelter
long_description: Sleep peacefully and pest-free! The Sea to Summit Nano Mosquito Pyramid Net Shelter with Insect Shield(R) maximizes coverage while minimizing weight and packed size. This net has been updated, and now uses an elasticized hanging cord and elasticized drawcord hem to keep the mesh under your mattress. 15-denier UltraVis mesh makes for a very light mesh with great visibility and air flow; 500 holes per square inch hexagonal mesh. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Repellent Gear repels mosquitoes, ticks, flies, and fleas. Invisible built-in Insect Shield(R) repellent remains effective through 6 months of exposure to weathering or through 25 launderings for washable items; do not dry clean. Elasticized hem secures fit around mattress. Elasticized hanging cord minimizes snagging and aids in height adjustment. Asymmetric shape improves headroom. Color-coded corners ease setup. 22 in. aluminum spreader pole for double version packs down to 5 in. Sea to Summit Nano Bug Shelter is packaged in a green Ultra-Sil stuff sack.
short_description: Sleep peacefully and pest-free! The Sea to Summit Nano Mosquito Pyramid Net Shelter with Insect Shield(R) maximizes coverage while minimizing weight and packed size.
